abstract.text: Sets the selection to the characters in an array of ranges in response to user action.

method. The ranges in the
array must begin and end on glyph boundaries and not split base glyphs and their nonspacing marks.

Returns a character index appropriate for placing a zero-length selection for an insertion point associated with the mouse at the given point.
